title: ActivityEvent
description: A lightweight activity notification for user dashboards and feeds. NOT for compliance, audit trails, or workflows - use entity version history and Task entity for those purposes.

id.description: Unique identifier for this activity event.

entity.description: Reference to the entity that changed.

about.description: EntityLink string identifying the specific entity/field/column the activity is about. Format: <#E::entityType::fqn::fieldName::arrayFieldName::arrayFieldValue>

domains.description: Domains this activity belongs to, inherited from the source entity for domain-scoped visibility.

actor.description: User or bot who performed the action.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the activity occurred in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

summary.description: Human-readable summary of the activity for display.

fieldName.description: Name of the field that was changed, if applicable.

oldValue.description: Previous value (truncated for display, not for audit).

newValue.description: New value (truncated for display, not for audit).

changeDescription.description: Optional structured change description with field-level details.
